data.eml:eml: A new species of Martarega White, 1879, with new distributional records of Notonectidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Nepomorpha) from Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barbosa, Julianna Freires, Rodrigues, Higor D. D. (2013): A new species of Martarega White, 1879, with new distributional records of Notonectidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Nepomorpha) from Brazil. Zootaxa 3682 (4): 534-540, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3682.4.4
